title: FuzzCoder: Byte-level Fuzzing Test via Large Language Model
details: L Yang, J Yang, C Wei, G Niu, G Zhang, Y Wang… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Fuzzing is an important dynamic program analysis technique designed for finding vulnerabilities in complex software. Fuzzing involves presenting a target program with crafted malicious input to cause crashes, buffer overflows, memory errors, and …
